text: Zisas vov Zakias phenan kim, Zakias mbaram khavgia thɨgap khaŋ Zisas ga nzuai, “Guma Bakɨme, ndu mbarara, gu ntigem wo bigi gu rɨgɨra nta sharav, tharir mba bigi sosuagi gumgir nɨɨnga. Gu vhɨra harigi gumgi, gu mbe guiguigav mbe han mbe bigi ndigi, gu ntige taagip mbe bigi ŋgarkav, gu fethɨgi bigin mben nɨɨŋgirga.”
